titleStmt.title: The copies of certaine letters vvhich haue passed betweene Spaine and England in matter of religion Concerning the generall motiues to the Romane obedience. Betweene Master Iames Wadesworth, a late pensioner of the holy Inquisition in Siuill, and W. Bedell a minister of the Gospell of Iesus Christ in Suffolke.
titleStmt.author: Wadsworth, James, 1572?-1623.
Bedell, William, 1571-1642. aut
Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for William Barret and Robert Milbourne,

notesStmt.note: Edited by Bedell, who signs the dedication.
Includes a letter from Joseph Hall.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
